mapper.select: SELECT per.path_id AS pathId,per.created_by as createdBy,role.role_code as rolecode FROM user_root_info role,root_permission_info per WHERE role.status = "1" AND per.status = "1" AND role.id = per.role_id ORDER BY per.last_updated_by ASC
